summary: The F-35 program continues to face operational testing delays. The Department of Defense has not finished developing the aircraft simulator, which delayed testing and again delayed the decision on when to start full production. We also found the program's schedule for its hardware and software modernization effort, known as "Block 4," was not realistic. The DOD routinely underestimated the amount of work needed to develop...
title: F-35 Joint Strike Fighter: DOD Needs to Update Modernization Schedule and Improve Data on Software Development
